biography.bio: Tony Larimer was born on April 18, 1929 in Evanston, Illinois, USA as Emmet Larimer. He was an actor, known for The Crow 3 - Salvation (2000), I Saw Mommy Kissing Santa Claus (2002) and It Is Fine! Everything Is Fine. (2007). He was married to Marie C. Larimer and Mary Elizabeth. He died on March 10, 2009 in Salt Lake City, Utah, USA.
biography.name: Tony Larimer

biography.bio: Geoffrey Bennett is an actor, known for Three O'Clock High (1987), Ski Patrol (1990) and In the Blink of an Eye (1996).
biography.name: Geoffrey Bennett

biography.bio: Kim Blackett is an actor, known for The Animated Book of Mormon (1987) and Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987).
biography.name: Kim Blackett

biography.bio: Beverly Rowland was born on August 27, 1928 in Salt Lake City, Utah, USA. She was an actress, known for Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers (1988), Mr. Krueger's Christmas (1980) and It Nearly Wasn't Christmas (1989). She was married to Oscar Rowland. She died on May 7, 2008 in St. George, Utah.
biography.name: Beverly Rowland

biography.bio: Walter Boyden is an actor, known for The Animated Book of Mormon (1987).
biography.name: Walter Boyden

biography.bio: William M. Bisson is an actor, known for The Animated Book of Mormon (1987).
biography.name: William M. Bisson

biography.bio: James Horrocks is an actor, known for Dumb & Dumber (1994), China O'Brien II (1990) and Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987).
biography.name: James Horrocks

biography.bio: Linda Bishop is known for her work on Big Eyes (2014), Will There Really Be a Morning? (1983) and Cagney & Lacey (1981).
biography.name: Linda Bishop

biography.bio: Paul Nichols is an actor, known for The Joseph Smith Story (1988), The Returning (1983) and The Animated Book of Mormon (1987).
biography.name: Paul Nichols

biography.bio: Gae P. Cowley is an actress, known for Promised Land (1987), China O'Brien (1990) and A Hobo's Christmas (1987).
biography.name: Gae P. Cowley

biography.bio: Christopher P. Angelos is an actor, known for The Animated Book of Mormon (1987), Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987) and Animated Hero Classics (1991).
biography.name: Christopher P. Angelos

biography.bio: James Arrington was born on December 17, 1948 as James Wesley Arrington. He is an actor, known for The Swan Princess (1994), The Swan Princess: Escape from Castle Mountain (1997) and The Swan Princess Christmas (2012).
biography.name: James Arrington

biography.bio: Wolf Jakubowicz was born in Berlin, Germany in 1930. Family escaped Berlin in 1933 and settled in Palestine where he grew up. In 1947 family migrated to the US, shortened their name to Jacobs and became naturalized citizens. Wolf, who became William Jacobs, was drafted in 1951 before becoming a citizen, and sent to the Korean front for all of 1952. Upon his discharge, he studied Drama at the Neighborhood Playhouse '53-'55 on the G.I.Bill. After graduation he was much involved in off-Broadway Theater and subsequently signed by theatrical agents, who had him change his professional name to William Sargent - which he later legalized. In 1960 he came to Hollywood for a minor film roll and stayed for the next 27 years working in T.V. and Theater. In 1987 he and his wife moved to Salt Lake City, where two years later, he opened a downtown Theater which ran for 4 seasons. He lives in Utah with his wife Patricia and their two cats - and now primarily does voice-overs.
biography.name: William Sargent

biography.bio: Duane Hill is an actor and writer, known for The Executioner's Song (1982), The Bobroom (2004) and Side by Side: The True Story of the Osmond Family (1982).
biography.name: Duane Hill
